" • Full support for Android Wear!

 • High resolution contact images are sent to the watch

" • MAJOR MMS/GROUP MESSAGE FIXES
 • Tap to resend/edit failed messages working

" • More L than ever before
 • Reduced app size to 3mb
 • Animated, beautiful checkboxes

" • Implemented colour palette based on Material Design colours
 • Over 190 colours available to choose from for QKSMS+ users
 • Completely redesigned the "default" app configuration to be more beautiful than ever. I actually use the default appearance settings myself now, I don't even feel the need to change them. THAT'S how good they look
 • New app icon
 • Updated all in-app icons to their Material Design equivalents
 • Added animations for changing themes and toggling system bar tints
 • You no longer need to restart the app for changing themes
 • You no longer need to restart the app for toggling system bar tints
 • You no longer need to restart the app for toggling system bar fixes
 • You no longer need to restart the app for changing font family, size, or weight
 • Fixed crash on opening MMS from iPhones
 • Minor UI tweaks"

" • You can now view and save MMS

" • Added expandable popups. Click the name to show more messages

 • Small UI tweaks

" • Fixed notification not automatically going away in conversations

" • Clicking on reply fields and send buttons is now much easier

 • Add colour to sent messages"
" • Fixed bug where popup saves outgoing messages to drafts"

" • Notification will now update when you mark a message as read or delete it from the popup
 • Fixed bug where deleting message from popup would cause conversation to get stuck as unread
 • Fixed crash that occurs when you try to open a message containing a draft. This should also fix the crashing if it has MMS, but I’m not able to test this myself yet
 • Added drafts
 • Added option to disable vibration
 • Fixed “To” and “From” mix-up in details popup
 • Disabled settings that don’t work yet"
" • Fixed wrong name showing for app in recent apps menu. Showed Conversations, now says QKSMS\n • Fixed bug where opening a conversation would crash the app if you turn off notifications"

" • Option to disable advertisements for alpha testers. It does require you to restart the app to take effect however
 • Expandable notifications when you get multiple messages. Now you can see each of the messages, and you can open the popup for a specific message without having to open the app
 • If you received multiple messages all from the same person, then clicking the notification will take you to that conversation, not the conversation list
 • When you try to delete a conversation, there will now be a popup that asks you to confirm your choice
 • Added menu to QuickReply popup that allows you to jump to the conversation, copy the message text, mark the message as read, or delete the message
 • Fixed bug where disabling QuickReply would also disable notifications
 • Minor performance enhancements﻿"
" • Drastic performance improvements in conversation list\n • Made vibration pattern more distinct\n • LED will now correctly match colour chosen as theme
" • Fixed crash when selecting contact suggestion in compose screen"

" • When you send a message it will instantly show up as "Sending" instead of only show up after it has been sent, giving the appearance of lag\n • Opening conversations should now be much smoother and faster\n • If a message fails to send then it will show up in the conversation as a failed message so you can try to resend it"
" • Fixed crash if the phone has no "owner"\n • Fixed text wrapping on messages\n • Notification will be less annoying when you're inside the app"

" • Added changelog
 • Loading pictures in conversation should now be more consistent
 • Messages in conversation will now show timestamps, and consecutive messages will only be grouped if they are within one hour of each other
 • Fixed bug where typing multiple lines in the reply field of the conversation would not move the messages up
 • Fixed scrollbar in conversation
" • Fixed bug where message would be added twice on pre KitKat devices\n • Made images in conversation messages more consistent

" • Added support for Android versions older than 4.4 KitKat
 • New conversation list
 • You can now delete messages and copy message text
 • Conversations can now be deleted
 • Fixed app randomly crashing when you exit
 • Popups will no longer pop up if you're in the same conversation, or in the conversation list
 • Fixed bug where timestamp in conversation list wouldn't update"
